bukkit.Vandolis
Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
  bukkit.Vandolis.Transaction

public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object

Class that handles any sort of economy action. Processes Transaction by adding/removing money/items

Author:
Vandolis

Method Detail

process

public static boolean process(Transaction trans)
Old and easy way to have a Transaction processed. Calls the full process function with the standard values.

Parameters:
trans -
Returns:
represents the status of it. 0 mean all went fine, if negative something went wrong

process

public static boolean process(Transaction trans,
                              boolean loud)
Calls a process of the transaction with the given loud value. If loud is false, then the transaction will be forced and no messages will be sent. Used by the badWord function.

Parameters:
trans -
loud -

For player to player payment the buyer pays the seller

Parameters:
trans -
flag - Undo trans or not. Changes the messages shown to the players

Parameters:
stack2 -

undoTransaction

public static boolean undoTransaction(Transaction trans)
Used to undo a Transaction. Undoes a transaction by switching all of the variables. I.E. buyer becomes seller, seller becomes buyer. Sell price is buy price, buy price is sell price. Works like a charm.

Parameters:
trans - the transaction to be reversed
